item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

10/3/2011's location will be:

Zafra: Cuban Restaurant and Rum Bar

Zafra is an Awesome Rum bar that opened this past spring in downtown.  Located on Orange Street just before the intersection with Elm, (Next to Christy's) this restaurant brings excellent competition to the Cuban cuisine in New Haven.  The food portions have been generous, and the various Rum based drinks are Delicious.  A couple collective members have rated this amongst the Best Mojitos in town, and probably the best 'Dark and Stormy' I've ever had.  They have a selection of Over 100 Rums to chose from!  You can even try a "Rum Flight" if inclined, holy smokes I think anyone would "take flight" after all those options!

The Owner Dominick, has offered us the following great specials:

"Mojito Monday" featuring $5 Mojitos

$3 Bottled Imported Beer.  (I recommend Xingu, it's tasty.)

$4 Draft Beers

Complementary Appetizers will be put out at the Bar!

A discount will be applied to the Cuban Nachos

A.J. will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

Please RSVP for this event when able.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

For more information about the Bar, please visit: www.zafrarumbar.com﻿

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

﻿
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
